about_the_game:
Humanity's last chance.

Enlist in the Legion and fight for freedom against a tyrant in a galaxy far, far away in this fierce, frantic, treacherous and fast-paced third-person shooter.

BECOME A HERO

You will join a squad of up to six Warriors who must exterminate the followers of the tyrant Nihilus with a bomb or through teamwork.
Take care of your allies — betrayal and friendly fire is a sad fact of this crusade, but it is impossible to win without working as a team.

THREATS

Nihilus is a being that has surpassed the level of superiority of an ordinary human. Extremely powerful, he can invoke natural disasters to make the work of the Legion's warriors difficult. But don't worry, as long as you stay in the safe zone that Vegner, the mad scientist, has prepared, you will be safe from all of Nihilus' attempts to exterminate your ship. However... Don't think you are completely safe, as Nihilus' followers are waiting, waiting for the right moment to overpower you.

CONSCIOUS PLANET

Tupã is a conscious planet that has become humanity's refuge. He is on your side, trying to protect the life that lives within you. Please save humanity!

content_descriptors.notes: Frontline: New Revolution é um jogo de tiro em terceira pessoa baseado em equipes, onde você se alista à Legião para lutar pela liberdade contra um tirano numa galáxia distante. Equipado com uma variedade de armas e estratégias, como pistolas, metralhadoras e ataques aéreos, enfrente inimigos ferozes em batalhas intensas. Prepare-se para um combate brutal com sangue, desmembramentos e explosões devastadoras enquanto luta para aniquilar as forças opressoras e garantir a vitória.

You will join a squad of up to six Warriors who must exterminate the followers of the tyrant Nihilus with a bomb or through teamwork.
Take care of your allies — betrayal and friendly fire is a sad fact of this crusade, but it is impossible to win without working as a team.

THREATS

Nihilus is a being that has surpassed the level of superiority of an ordinary human. Extremely powerful, he can invoke natural disasters to make the work of the Legion's warriors difficult. But don't worry, as long as you stay in the safe zone that Vegner, the mad scientist, has prepared, you will be safe from all of Nihilus' attempts to exterminate your ship. However... Don't think you are completely safe, as Nihilus' followers are waiting, waiting for the right moment to overpower you.

Tupã is a conscious planet that has become humanity's refuge. He is on your side, trying to protect the life that lives within you. Please save humanity!
name: Frontline: New Revolution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I3-10100F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10, 32-64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Drogas ilícitas
Conteúdo sexual
